message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly beneficial for you, and I'm pleased to offer it to you for $1,100,000. This is a very competitive price considering the value it will bring to your operations.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,025,000? This reflects the product's worth while still offering you a fair deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,025,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950,000. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  It's clear this product would be a valuable asset to you.  While $950,000 is closer to what I had in mind, I need to get at least $990,000 to make this work. This is my final offer, as I do have other interested parties.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $990,000. I'm willing to go up to $980,000. Can we meet at this price?
